description: Episode of Series "African Continent" Shows geographic regions; population distribution, cultural influences, primary agricultural and natural resources, and emergence and development of the tropical region of Africa. Show four major regions: coastal lowlands, Congo Basin, Eastern Highlands, and Sudan, their climates, products and habitants, and the water power and mineral resources available but undeveloped.
